Combat Notes:

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Sneak Attack: Hit +10d6 HP when surprising or flanking
Strength Attack Adjustment: -1
Strength Damage Adjustment: -1
Weapon Finesse: +3 light melee weapon attack (dex instead of str)
Weapon Focus (Sickle): +1 Sickle Attack Modifier
Bleeding Attack: Sneak attack causes extra 10 HP/rd until healed
Crippling Strike: 2 points Str damage from sneak attack
Defensive Roll: DC damage Reflex save vs. lethal blow for half damage
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 24+
Master Strike: Sneak attack causes choice of sleep, paralysis, or death (DC 22 Fort neg)
Opportunist: AOO vs. foe struck by ally
Resiliency: 1 minute of 20 temporary HP when below 0 HP 1/dy
Run: Retain dex bonus to AC while running
Slow Reactions: Sneak attack target no AOO 1 rd
Stand Up: Stand from prone as free action
Strike Back: Ready melee attack against any foe that attacks you
Surprise Attack: All foes flat-footed during surprise round
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dex modifier to AC

Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1
Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Resist Enchantment: +2 vs. enchantment
Sleep Immunity: Immune Sleep
Slippery Mind: Second save vs. enchantment
Trap Sense: +6 Reflex and AC vs. traps
